t: Find a Missing Item from Your Amazon Order - Amazon Customer Service
s: If an item is missing from your package, it may have shipped separately. Learn how to check if the missing item is in another package.

t: Replace a Damaged, Defective, or Broken Item - Amazon Customer Service
s: Find more solutions · Visit Your Orders and we will let you know what your options are for damaged, defective, or broken items

t: What's going on with Amazon? No shipping box or bag - Bogleheads.org
s: Last edited by CorradoJr on Wed Aug 09, 2023 10:43 pm, edited 1 time in total. ... I’m a very heavy user of Amazon and have not have this happen. Everything I have received recently has been in a sealed paper or padded plastic bag. Few boxes.

t: Incorrect, Damaged, or Missing Amazon Fresh or Whole Foods Market Items - Amazon Customer Service
s: Items can be substituted or removed from your order after checkout due to availability. Check the order details in Your Account to see any substitutions or undeliverable items.

t: Returns and Replacements - FAQ - Amazon Customer Service
s: For issues related to defective items received by a customer, Amazon does not have a provision for processing replacements or refunds to customers. The customer must reach out to the brand/service centre for further resolutions (repair, replacement, warranty, etc.) according to the brand warranty ...

t: What should you do if your Amazon package is missing one of the items you ordered? - Quora
s: Answer (1 of 10): I’ve had that happen just once. What I did was contact the seller and explain I order 2 of X, and received 1 of X. They immediately apologized and said a replacement would be shipped forthwith. It was, and I received it. Now, in a sense is was my word against the order. Howeve...

t: Open Box Inspection - Amazon Customer Service
s: In line with Amazon.in Returns Policy, once you have successfully verified that the product is damage-free, correct and complete through the Open Box inspection, the product will be ineligible for delivery cancellation or refusal.

t: Missing Amazon Package - Amazon Customer Service
s: If your Amazon package shows as delivered but you are not able to find it, visit Amazon Customer Service website. Find details on how to track your order down.

t: Find a Missing Package that Shows as Delivered - Amazon Customer Service
s: Follow these steps if tracking shows a package as delivered in Your Orders, but you are unable to find it.

t: Return Items You Ordered - Amazon Customer Service
s: You can return many eligible items sold on Amazon.com. When you return an item, you may see different return options depending on the seller, item, or reason for return.

t: Where's My Stuff? - Amazon Customer Service
s: What to do when your package is not delivered, when tracking shows package as delivered but you haven’t received it or when you have other delivery issues.

t: About Mistaken Returns to Amazon - Amazon Customer Service
s: Ensure you send the correct and complete item when making a return. The correct item must be returned to receive a refund.
Amazon undeliverable packages are returned to us and we issue a refund, where applicable.

t: Package undelivered? Find out how you can reach out to Amazon - Amazon Customer Service
s: Learn how to reach out to Amazon for undeliverable packages, and how to raise a complaint in Amazon for undelivered orders.

t: Report Unsolicited Packages or Brushing Scams - Amazon Customer Service
s: Third-party sellers are prohibited from sending unsolicited packages to customers. If you receive a package that you did not order and is not a gift, report it immediately.

t: Damaged or Defective Item - Amazon Customer Service
s: All our products go through intense quality check before they are shipped. However, in rare instances a product may get damaged during transit. Read below for Frequently Asked Questions about damaged or defective products.
